name: Thirty-One: The Game
short_description: Thirty-One is a fun little game, where the user plays against the computer in a race to the number 31 (thirty one).  Each selects a number until the aggregate equals 31.  To also be extended to player versus player.  Also, will hopefully gain a GUI.
